document.full_text: the chicago bulls beat the boston celtics 97-81 on thursday to open a four-game lead at the top of the eastern conference and move to within one victory of clinching home-court advantage throughout the nba playoffs.
document.title: bulls trample celtics in home race
lines_and_colors: the chicago bulls beat the boston celtics 97-81 on thursday to open a four-game lead at the top of the eastern conference and move to within one victory of clinching home-court advantage throughout the nba playoffs.
